WRITING.TEXT: Shes got a sense of humor so I would say yes! Just as long as theres no penis pictures I think were good lol
I don't know who you are ..but yes! That's usually our sunday breakfast with the family... shes actually on the wall at Kivas when you walk in to the right !
hahahaha that is amazing... I know .. trust me no one can believe it.... and shes in great shape its insane!!!
lol Sorry to disappoint ... this was Vday 2015 lol
TRUUUST me lol My cousin and I already discussed opening everything with her !!!!!! There's always that one fun loving person out there!!!
It wouldn't take that many Redditors she is very light =)
She has out lived almost everyone!!! Her son is still alive an all grandchildren are still here.... I am praying for her to be at my wedding whenever that will be lol

Here is Gramma Getting ready for V-Day [Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/xJOsbCS.jpg)
Here she is making a vegetable soup from scratch with no help last week [Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/3btXMm0.jpg)
PROOF: When she turned 100 she got two letters one from the Prime Minister of Canada Stephen Harper [Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/33oviYj.jpg) and one from Queen Elizabeth [Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/29frRgd.jpg)

If your asking if this is just a random forward...
No This IS MY Great grandmother and I see her all the time. Next time I am with her I will get her to hold up a reddit sign if you want? lol
I am really asking for help here =) xoxo

Thank you guys! 3 Honestly she acts like shes 50 !
I wish you could all meet her. She does mostly everything by herself. Living at home with a family friend who just keeps an eye on her.. but trust me when I said Rose does not want or need any help!. She still goes shopping at the mall whenever she can, Sunday morning breakfast with family, watches Wheel of Fortune whenever she can.
I went over to her house last month and there was a roast in the oven.. I was in shock after I found out she is the one who put it in there... could you imagine a 106 lady picking up a heavy roast, bending down to put it in the oven!
She has a fashion sense better then half the people I know. The only thing bothering her these days is that her hearing is going... But she can still hear! lol
She is an amazing woman and that is why I am trying so hard to get as many birthday cards sent to her and make her world so much warmer once she receives them all.

FYI: The address is a Post Office box So more letters the better!!!!!!
Please send to: Gramma Rose Lefko-Cohen 8000 Bathurst St. Unit 1 PO Box 30044 New Westminster PO Vaughan, Ontario L4J 0B8

WRITING.TITLE: Forget myself....it's for my great grammas 107th birthday!!!
WRITING.TEXT:
"Ive been so lucky. Do you know that the world is made up of wonderful people? Its not everybody that realizes it. And I do. Rose Lefko Cohen http://www.thestar.com/news/gta/2013/03/19/thoughts_on_life_love_and_family_at_age_105_north_yorks_rose_lefkocohen.html
My Great Gramma Rose is turning 107 on March 19th, and as you can see from the quote above, she is a lady of true optimism, strength and happiness. Her outlook on life and people is extremely admirable. Please help make this the most loved birthday she has ever had. Gramma Rose knows that we are all wonderful people; lets celebrate her 107th year and let her know how admirable she is! For as long as I've known her she has always loved reading and re-reading cards. Please help out and be part of this amazing gift and send a birthday card, letter, picture, anything you like. Gramma Rose already knows this world is made up of wonderful people. Lets give back to her and show her just that!
Please send to: Gramma Rose Lefko-Cohen 8000 Bathurst St. Unit 1 PO Box 30044 New Westminster PO Vaughan, Ontario L4J 0B8

HAHAHA I DID THAT TODAY! I work in child care and these two kids Corinna and Paige.... Paige was calling Corinna over and over and I said "Corinna! I think you're being Paged" all the kids started laughing and then I realized what I said lol.

This tank is anything but Claustrophobic It is very deep and I keep it very clean. My Roseline Sharks are my longest with the angle who have been in the tank. I know they are schooling fish which is why I have two. When I move out I plan to get a bigger tank with more Roselines. (my favorite fish which I know need a lot of room)
My temp is also good according to the fish store lol I keep it between 25-27C
I've had this tank and these fish for 4-5 years and they seem happy. I also think my tank is actually 56g I understand any animal should not be locked up in a small area, but I am an animal lover and care a lot for my pets.

I had another angle a few years ago but my boyfriend got drunk one new years and over fed them so one of the angle died =(..they are big and bullies so I am sticking with the one angle =) Thank you I have tons of tiny bottles my mom and I collect them I keep the doubles in my room lol
I have one of those... i thought it was for only squeezing out black heads... I've actually never used it lol

so basically I am a popper and a picker and a scratcher.. I heard it might scar or let a lot of dirt in..... but my question then would be... if I don't pop it... then were does the white puss go?????

your dad looks like he was no older than 21 in this picture
I think she is amazing and has the most average body and I am proud of her.

She is insanely energetic! She still walks around (using a walker) Other then that she lived alone up until 2 years ago and never really wants the live ins help =) She still goes out for breakfast with family every weekend. Mall as much as she can with her grand daughter. Always trying to get the best deals. Her clothing style is with the latest trends. Shes amazing I hope I am half of what she is when I'm 60 ! lol

Here is some other articles about her the Toronto Star when she turned 100 http://www.thestar.com/life/parent/2008/05/10/a_mothers_romance_with_life.html
